name: LIAR, LIONESS
description:
A 100-page trans fantasy visual novella about queerness, fairies, and power. Digital soundtrack releasing with Civic Duty Record on Valentine's day 2021 and available at FEYXUAN bandcamp by the end of February! Paperback, cassette, and poster bundle available for preorder from Flower Press in March! 

Please email CONTACT[@]FEYXUAN[.]COM if you want to be notified when preorders open. 

TWs: eye trauma, violence, 18+ NSFW content 

°•. ✿ .•° °•. ✿ .•°  °•. ✿ .•°

Who serves a servant?

THE LAST GLASSWING KNIGHT, Sir Sengreen Le (they/them), is crestfallen and confused and a little bit furious that their lifelong master has abandoned them for no reason, ending their service together. Now, Sengreen has to contend with a new Moon Emperor who calls herself THE EMPYREAN MONARCH, Lin Xue (he/she). This stranger from a strange land is Lunarian, like Sengreen, but not in any way that Sengreen can understand. As if it weren't enough to navigate the shifting seas of palace politics in the Crescent Court, Sengreen has to stand their ground against Lin Xue, who says she wishes to be their friend.

She doesn't, of course.

All the same, Sengreen ends up entangled in the kingmaking game of Divinities with Lin Xue, which is not so different from the power plays of intimacy they level against each other, as uncomfortable as it is to acknowledge.

Sengreen, if nothing else, intends to win. 

What a shame Lin Xue thinks he'll do the same.
